data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,471,000 people living in Faizabad through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Faizabad who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Faizabad, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Gadaria (Muslim traditions) people might believe through him.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Faizabad. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: the county of Faizabad has (about) 27,181 people who know Jesus, 29,981 people who know about him culturally, and 2,413,838 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

location.name: Faizabad
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Rikhisur, Gadaria Dhingar, Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions), Jat Deswal, Lakhera
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Rikhisur (52,000), Gadaria Dhingar (1,188,000), Jat Dehia (Muslim traditions) (1,800), Jat Deswal (74,000), Lakhera (189,000)
